title: Kinesthetic Finance Learning Path
description: A personalized learning path for individuals with intermediate expertise in finance who prefer kinesthetic learning style.
goals: Enhance understanding of personal finance concepts through hands-on activities.

milestones.title: Introduction to Personal Finance
milestones.description: Basic overview of personal finance principles and budgeting techniques.

resources.title: Budgeting Worksheet
resources.type: Hands-on budgeting worksheet to track expenses and income.

milestones.title: Exploring Investment Options
milestones.description: Learn about different investment vehicles such as stocks, bonds, and mutual funds.

resources.title: Stock Market Simulation Game
resources.type: Interactive game to simulate stock market trading.

milestones.title: Debt Management Techniques
milestones.description: Strategies for managing and reducing debt effectively.

resources.title: Debt Repayment Plan Activity
resources.type: Hands-on activity to create a personalized debt repayment plan.

prerequisites: Basic understanding of financial terms and concepts
